DOC.detailed_description: Inofolic Plus® contain several nutritional element include myo-inositol , melatonin , folic acid . Myo-inositol find helpful improve egg quality and/or quantity woman ovarian abnormality call polycystic ovarian syndrome well woman without disorder undergoing assist reproduction . Myo-inositol folic acid compound belong family B-vitamins . Inositol normally find several type food . Folic acid find significantly decrease incidence certain type birth defect woman take sufficient amount prior pregnancy . Preliminary study use myo-inositol folic acid demonstrate improvement egg quality in-vitro in-vivo well multiple metabolic parameter woman irregular menstrual cycle certain type hormone imbalance . Melatonin potent antioxidant . Folic acid classify antioxidant report antioxidant-like activity . Antioxidants give infertile men year improve egg parameter . Most recently , study document efficacy antioxidant treatment human egg parameter fertilization rate , especially set in-vitro fertilization ( IVF ) . Inofolic Plus® contain melatonin folic acid . Dr. Roseff hypothesize Inofolic Plus® may effective correct abnormal egg parameter woman . A woman may abnormal egg expose environmental workplace toxin generate oxygen free radical body ( know reactive oxygen specie , ROS ) . These ROS circulate blood stream enter ovary egg store . Eggs may sensitive ROS , damage ROS may result poor egg quality quantity . The combination nutrient antioxidants Inofolic Plus® may help correct abnormality . Melatonin natural hormone normally find brain . This hormone help regulate sleep/wake cycle . Melatonin level increase even remain high night . This elevated level melatonin think induce drowsiness . It effect recommend take Inofolic Plus® late even near bedtime .
